title: The Town mouse and the country mouse
creator_credit: Evelyn Lambart, Kathleen Shannon and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Evelyn Lambert’s well-known style of animation using paper figures and brightly coloured backgrounds, based on an Aesop fable. Tells the simple story of two mice with different lifestyles and suggests that it is far better to live simply and in peace than live in luxury amidst danger
